mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_tb (board_type, title, content_json, author_user_id, qna_status) VALUES ( #{boardType}, #{title}, CAST(#{contentJson} AS JSON), #{authorUserId}, #{qnaStatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT post_id, board_type, title, content_json, author_user_id, qna_status, created_at, updated_at FROM post_tb WHERE post_id = #{postId}
mapper.update: UPDATE post_tb SET title = #{title}, content_json = CAST(#{contentJson} AS JSON), qna_status = #{qnaStatus}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE post_id = #{postId}
